column4: Newbie Question: i want rtorrent to download to /home/username/torrent, so in /home/username/rtorrent.rc, i edited directory = ~/torrent, but it will download to /home/username/ instead of /home/username/torrent. Anyone know what to do? :)
i don't know much about rtorrent but try changing it to ~/torrent/ instead
: hmmm, that might work. ill give it a shot. :) thanks.
